8Limbs,OneHeart(MuayThaiDocumentary).name: 8 Limbs, One Heart (Muay Thai Documentary)
8Limbs,OneHeart(MuayThaiDocumentary).summary: 8 Limbs, One Heart is a powerful documentary following two brothers from Chiang Mai, Thailand, whose lives were shaped by hardship and forged through Muay Thai. What began as a means of survival became a lifelong discipline—transforming them into respected experts of Thailand’s national art. Through sacrifice, resilience, and unbreakable brotherhood, their journey carries them beyond the ring to building Muay Thai gyms across Thailand and China. This film explores more than fighting—it reveals the spirit, culture, and global connection of Muay Thai as it bridges tradition with the modern world. From the mountains of Chiang Mai to training mats across continents, 8 Limbs, One Heart is a story of identity, legacy, and the power of discipline to change lives.

MuayThaiIsPain..name: Muay Thai is Pain.
MuayThaiIsPain..summary: Muay Thai is PAIN. Kru Bunpot was a promising young fighter climbing the ranks of the prestigious stadium circuit in Bangkok, when a knee injury sadly cut short his fight career. Despite the pain, he couldn’t stay away from the sport he loves. Today, he’s a highly sought after trainer known for his dominant clinch style and a meticulous eye for coaching. You might have also seen him rag dolling Saenchai in a viral training video. This is his story.

Smoker|MuayThaiDocumentary|.name: SMOKER | Muay Thai Documentary |
Smoker|MuayThaiDocumentary|.summary: Follow along side 4 brave fighters as they prepare for their first SMOKER
